snippet: The Philharmonia Baroque Orchestra will perform two Handel operas at the Mostly Mozart Festival, one with an assist from the Mark Morris Dance Group.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim Critic's Notebook notes that Philharmonia Baroque Orchestra will perform Handel operas Acis and Galetea and Tesco at Lincoln Center as part of the Mostly Mozart Festival; applauds longtime conductor Nicholas McGegan's contribution to orchestra's success, as well as interest brought by collaboration with Mark Morris Dance Company.
lead_paragraph: The Philharmonia Baroque Orchestra will perform two Handel operas at the Mostly Mozart Festival, one with an assist from the Mark Morris Dance Group.

headline.seo: Philharmonia Baroque Orchestra Joins Mostly Mozart
headline.main: Like a Jazz Band, but 18th Century
headline.print_headline: Like a Jazz Band, but 18th Century
